title: Mottu Ondru Song Lyrics Kushi
stanzas:
Mottu Ondru Song Lyrics Kushi
#Deva #Hariharan #SadhanaSargam #Vairamuthu

Yaar solvadho
yaar solvadho..

mottu ondru
malarndhida marukkum.
muttum thendral
thottu thottu thirakkum.

adhu malarin tholviyaa
illai kaattril vetriyaa
mmm yaa yaa.. (2)

kallukulle sirppam
thoongi kidakkum.
adhu kallin tholviyaa
illai uzhiyin vetriyaa.

yaar solvadho, padhil
yaar solvadho

megam enbadhu ada
malai mudichu
kaatru muttinaal
avilndhu kollum.

kadhal enbadhu
iru mana mudichu
kangal muttinaal
avilndhu kollum

megangal muttikolvadhaale
sandai endru porul illai.

dhegangal muttik kolvadhaale
oodal endru porul illai

idhalgal poi sollum
idhayam mei sollum
theriyaadhaa unmai
theriyaadhaa

kadhal vidhai pola
mounam manpola
mulaikkaadhaa mannai
thulaikkaadhaa.

yaar solvadho, padhil
yaar solvadho

pani koodangal mella
udaindhu vittaal
uyir janikkum
uyir janikkum

mouna koodangal
mella udaindhu vittaal
kadhal pirakkum
kadhal pirakkum

ullaithai moodi moodi
thaithaal kalai illai
kadhal illai.

ullangai pole
ullam vaithaal
bayam illai
baaram illai.

naanal kaanaamal
oodal kondaalum
nanaikkaadhaa nadhi
nanaikkaadhaa

kamalam neerodu
kavildhe nindraalum
thirakkaadhaa kadhir
thirakkaaddhaa.

yaar solvadho, padhil
yaar solvadho

mottu ondru
malarndhida marukkum.
muttum thendral

kallukulle sirppam
thoongi kidakkum.
chinna uli thatti
thatti ezhuppum.
